DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect gemcabene HDL‐C , LDL‐C , TG , lipid level patient low HDL‐C
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Gemcabene Patients With Low HDL‐C Either Normal Elevated Triglycerides
DOC.criteria: Men naturally postmenopausal surgically menopausal woman 18 80 year age Baseline HDL‐C < 35 mg/dL ( 0.9 mmol/L ) Creatine phosphokinase ( CPK ) > 3 × upper limit normal ( ULN ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 35 kg/m2 Uncontrolled Hypertension > 95 mm Hg Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( HbA1c > 10 % ) Renal dysfunction ( blood urea nitrogen [ BUN ] creatinine > 2 × ULN ) ; Hepatic dysfunction ( aspartate aminotransferase [ AST ] alanine aminotransferase [ ALT ] > 2 × ULN ) Uncontrolled hypothyroidism ( TSH > 1.5 × ULN ) Myocardial infarction , severe unstable angina pectoris , coronary angioplasty , coronary artery bypass graft , major cardiovascular event result hospitalization previous 3 month
